title: Letter to the Editor: Location and progression of white-matter lesions, lacunar infarcts and atrophy associated with motivational and mood symptoms in patients with symptomatic atherosclerotic disease: things to ponder
abstract: Letter to the Editor: Location and progression of white-matter lesions, lacunar infarcts and atrophy associated with motivational and mood symptoms in patients with symptomatic atherosclerotic disease: things to ponder - Volume 42 Issue 1
